verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the Feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> that His hour <S%G5610><s%> had come <S%G2064><s%> that He should depart <S%G3327><s%> out of this <S%G3778><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> to the Father, <S%G3962><s%> having loved <S%G25><s%> His own <S%G2398><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> were in the world, <S%G2889><s%> He loved <S%G25><s%> them to the end. <S%G5056><s%>

And during <S%G1096><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> having already <S%G2235><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> [the son] of Simon, <S%G4613><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> Him,

[Jesus,] knowing <S%G3609><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> into His hands, <S%G5495><s%> and that He had come <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> and was going <S%G5217><s%> back <S%G5217><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%>

rose <S%G1453><s%> from supper, <S%G1173><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> aside <S%G5087><s%> His garments; <S%G2440><s%> and taking <S%G2983><s%> a towel, <S%G3012><s%> He girded <S%G1241><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> about. <S%G1241><s%>

Then <S%G1534><s%> He poured <S%G906><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> into the basin, <S%G3537><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> the disciples' feet, <S%G4228><s%> and to wipe <S%G1591><s%> them with the towel <S%G3012><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> He was girded. <S%G1241><s%>
And so <S%G3767><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter. <S%G4074><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> do You wash <S%G3538><s%> my feet <S%G4228><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "What <S%G3739><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> you do not realize <S%G3609><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> but you shall understand <S%G1097><s%> hereafter. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3778><s%>"

Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall You wash <S%G3538><s%> my feet! <S%G4228><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, "If <S%G1437><s%> I do not wash <S%G3538><s%> you, you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> with Me."

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> not my feet <S%G4228><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> my hands <S%G5495><s%> and my head. <S%G2776><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "He who has bathed <S%G3068><s%> needs <S%G5532><s%> only <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> but is completely <S%G3650><s%> clean; <S%G2513><s%> and you are clean, <S%G2513><s%> but not all <S%G3956><s%> [of you.]"
For He knew <S%G3609><s%> the one who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him; for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Not all <S%G3956><s%> of you are clean. <S%G2513><s%>"

And so <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> He had washed <S%G3538><s%> their feet, <S%G4228><s%> and taken <S%G2983><s%> His garments, <S%G2440><s%> and reclined <S%G377><s%> [at the table] again, <S%G3825><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I have done <S%G4160><s%> to you?
"You call <S%G5455><s%> Me Teacher <S%G1320><s%> and Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and you are right, <S%G2573><s%> for [so] I am. <S%G1510><s%>

"If <S%G1487><s%> I then, <S%G3767><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and the Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> washed <S%G3538><s%> your feet, <S%G4228><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another's feet. <S%G4228><s%>
"For I gave <S%G1325><s%> you an example <S%G5262><s%> that you also <S%G2532><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> as I did <S%G4160><s%> to you.

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, a slave <S%G1401><s%> is not greater <S%G3173><s%> than his master; <S%G2962><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> [is] one <S%G652><s%> who is sent <S%G652><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> than the one who sent <S%G3992><s%> him.
"If <S%G1487><s%> you know <S%G3609><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> you are blessed <S%G3107><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> them.

"I do not speak <S%G3004><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> of you. I know <S%G3609><s%> the ones <S%G5100><s%> I have chosen; <S%G1586><s%> but [it is] that the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> may be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> 'He who eats <S%G5176><s%> My bread <S%G740><s%> has lifted <S%G1869><s%> up his heel <S%G4418><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> Me.'

"From now <S%G737><s%> on I am telling <S%G3004><s%> you before <S%G4253><s%> [it] comes <S%G1096><s%> to pass, <S%G1096><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that when <S%G3752><s%> it does occur, <S%G1096><s%> you may believe <S%G4100><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> [He.]

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, he who receives <S%G2983><s%> whomever <S%G302><s%> <S%G5100><s%> I send <S%G3992><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> Me; and he who receives <S%G2983><s%> Me receives <S%G2983><s%> Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me."

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He became troubled <S%G5015><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and testified, <S%G3140><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that one <S%G1520><s%> of you will betray <S%G3860><s%> Me."

The disciples <S%G3101><s%> [began] looking <S%G991><s%> at one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> at a loss <S%G639><s%> [to know] of which <S%G5101><s%> one <S%G5101><s%> He was speaking. <S%G3004><s%>
There was reclining <S%G345><s%> on Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' breast <S%G2859><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus loved. <S%G25><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> gestured <S%G3506><s%> to him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Tell <S%G3004><s%> [us] who <S%G5101><s%> it is of whom <S%G3739><s%> He is speaking. <S%G3004><s%>"
He, leaning <S%G377><s%> back <S%G377><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> on Jesus' breast, <S%G4738><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is it?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "That is the one for whom <S%G3739><s%> I shall dip <S%G911><s%> the morsel <S%G5596><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> it to him." So <S%G3767><s%> when He had dipped <S%G911><s%> the morsel, <S%G5596><s%> He took <S%G2983><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> it to Judas, <S%G2455><s%> [the son] of Simon <S%G4613><s%> Iscariot. <S%G2469><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> the morsel, <S%G5596><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into him. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "What <S%G3739><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> quickly. <S%G5036><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table] knew <S%G1097><s%> for what <S%G5101><s%> purpose He had said <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> to him.

For some <S%G5100><s%> were supposing, <S%G1380><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the money <S%G1101><s%> box, <S%G1101><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Buy <S%G59><s%> the things we have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of for the feast <S%G1859><s%>"; or <S%G2228><s%> else, <S%G2228><s%> that he should give <S%G1325><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%>
And so <S%G3767><s%> after receiving <S%G2983><s%> the morsel <S%G5596><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out immediately; <S%G2117><s%> and it was night. <S%G3571><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he had gone <S%G1831><s%> out, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Now <S%G3568><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> is glorified <S%G1392><s%> in Him;

if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is glorified <S%G1392><s%> in Him, God <S%G2316><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> Him in Himself, <S%G846><s%> and will glorify <S%G1392><s%> Him immediately. <S%G2117><s%>

" Little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> with you a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G3398><s%> longer. <S%G2089><s%> You shall seek <S%G2212><s%> Me; and as I said <S%G3004><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> I now <S%G737><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to you also, <S%G2532><s%> 'Where <S%G3699><s%> I am going, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G1831><s%>'

"A new <S%G2537><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you, that you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I have loved <S%G25><s%> you, that you also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

" By this <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> will know <S%G1097><s%> that you are My disciples, <S%G3101><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> love <S%G26><s%> for one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are You going <S%G5217><s%>?" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Where <S%G3699><s%> I go, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> Me now; <S%G3568><s%> but you shall follow <S%G190><s%> later. <S%G5305><s%>"

Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> I not follow <S%G190><s%> You right <S%G737><s%> now <S%G737><s%>? I will lay <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> my life <S%G5590><s%> for You."

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Will you lay <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> your life <S%G5590><s%> for Me? Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, a cock <S%G220><s%> shall not crow, <S%G5455><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> you deny <S%G720><s%> Me three <S%G5151><s%> times. <S%G5151><s%>
